localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: ODD is an 8-week program for ambitious designers who want to hone their skills, increase their impact and become world-class design leaders – surrounded by a community of incredible peers.
blogPost.body: ODD is an 8-week program for ambitious designers who want to hone their skills, increase their impact and become world-class design leaders – surrounded by a community of incredible peers.
blogPost.title: On Deck Designer Fellowship - Turning designers into world-class design leaders
blogPost.author: Kevin William David

localize.description: ODD是一个为期8周的项目，面向雄心勃勃的设计师，他们想要磨练自己的技能，增加自己的影响力，成为世界级的设计领袖-周围都是令人难以置信的同行社区。
localize.tagline: 让设计师成为世界级的设计领军人物

localize.description: ODD是一個爲期8周的項目，面向雄心勃勃的設計師，他們想要磨練自己的技能，增加自己的影響力，成爲世界級的設計領袖-周圍都是令人難以置信的同行社區。
localize.tagline: 讓設計師成爲世界級的設計領軍人物

previous.excerpt: Get your Google Sheets data as a direct link tocsv orjson file that is always up to date. Forget about downloading file and then re-uploading it again somehwere else!
previous.title: Sheet2data - Direct URL to a .csv or .json with your Google Sheets data

localize.description: 获取您的Google Sheets数据作为一个直接链接tocsv或json文件，始终是最新的。忘了下载文件，然后重新上传它在其他地方的一些地方!
localize.tagline: 将您的Google Sheets数据直接连接到.csv或.json的URL。

localize.description: 獲取您的Google Sheets數據作爲一個直接鏈接tocsv或json文件，始終是最新的。忘了下載文件，然後重新上傳它在其他地方的一些地方!
localize.tagline: 將您的Google Sheets數據直接連接到.csv或.json的URL。

next.excerpt: Labeling images is essential for good computer vision models. Roboflow Annotate empowers you to annotate images easily & model-assisted labeling can take a first pass at labeling your images for you! You can export to any format (COCO JSON, TFRecord, VOC XML…)
next.title: Roboflow Annotate - Annotate images with ease. Export to any format.

localize.description: 给图像贴标签是做好计算机视觉模型的关键。Roboflow Annotate使您能够轻松地对图像进行标注，并且模型辅助标注可以为您的图像进行第一次标注！Roboflow Annotate可以为您提供任何格式的输出（COCO JSON, TFRecord, VOC XML...）。你可以导出为任何格式（COCO JSON, TFRecord, VOC XML...）。
localize.tagline: 轻松注释图像。导出为任何格式。

localize.description: 給圖像貼標籤是做好計算機視覺模型的關鍵。Roboflow Annotate使您能夠輕鬆地對圖像進行標註，並且模型輔助標註可以爲您的圖像進行第一次標註！Roboflow Annotate可以爲您提供任何格式的輸出（COCO JSON, TFRecord, VOC XML...）。你可以導出爲任何格式（COCO JSON, TFRecord, VOC XML...）。
localize.tagline: 輕鬆註釋圖像。導出爲任何格式。
